PAD_Poems.synopsis: Several poems and plays can be found at Arcane Tower. Each contains a passphrase for Automaton. To attract player's attention to this fact and give a slight hint, player's character has this small remark after reading first of these fine pieces. The dialog must not explicitly point that there's a passphrase in the piece, rather just comment freely on the taste of the wizard who read them.

PAD_SecretButtons.synopsis: Automaton in the Underdark tower can give to player (or drop) a magic ring. While wearing this ring, a secret hidden button appears in the tower's teleport. That button leads to undeground lab. This PAD was added to explain to player that wearing the ring led to button to appear.

VB_LiftBlocked.synopsis: VB when the player clicks on the elevator, but it is unusable because of the sussur tree's anti-magic aura.

PAD_Lights.synopsis: Arcane Tower is full of magical mysteries. Light sources are among them: they aren't just usual torches and braziers, but rather arcane ones, powered by magic. Player has to find a way to power up them with magic source. Interacting with the lights gives this PAD.
